humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the invasive lobular carcinoma forms a mass with a maximum dimension of 2.8 x 2.6 x 6 x 2 cm. Since the largest tumor size is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has invasive lobular carcinoma, which forms a 2.8 x 2.6 x 6.0 x 2.0 cm mass. According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system for breast cancer, T2 stage is defined as a tumor size of 2.0 to 5.0 cm. Therefore, the patient's T stage would be T2.
